Therefore, thou son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, prophesy<S>5012</S> against Gog<S>1463</S>, and say<S>559</S>, Thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Behold, I am against thee, O Gog<S>1463</S>, the chief<S>7218</S> prince<S>5387</S> of Meshech<S>4902</S> and Tubal<S>8422</S>:
And I will turn thee back<S>7725</S>, and leave but the sixth part<S>8338</S> of thee, and will cause thee to come up<S>5927</S> from the north<S>6828</S> parts<S>3411</S>, and will bring<S>935</S> thee upon the mountains<S>2022</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>: <sup>leave: or, strike thee with six plagues: or, draw thee back with an hook of six teeth</sup> <sup>the north: Heb. the sides of the north</sup>
And I will smite<S>5221</S> thy bow<S>7198</S> out of thy left<S>8040</S> hand<S>3027</S>, and will cause thine arrows<S>2671</S> to fall<S>5307</S> out of thy right<S>3225</S> hand<S>3027</S>.
Thou shalt fall<S>5307</S> upon the mountains<S>2022</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, thou, and all thy bands<S>102</S>, and the people<S>5971</S> that is with thee: I will give<S>5414</S> thee unto the ravenous<S>5861</S> birds<S>6833</S> of every sort<S>3671</S>, and to the beasts<S>2416</S> of the field<S>7704</S> to be devoured<S>402</S>. <sup>sort: Heb. wing</sup> <sup>to be: Heb. to devour</sup>
Thou shalt fall<S>5307</S> upon the open<S>6440</S> field<S>7704</S>: for I have spoken<S>1696</S> it, saith<S>5002</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>. <sup>the open: Heb. the face of the field</sup>
And I will send<S>7971</S> a fire<S>784</S> on Magog<S>4031</S>, and among them that dwell<S>3427</S> carelessly<S>983</S> in the isles<S>339</S>: and they shall know<S>3045</S> that I am the LORD<S>3068</S>. <sup>carelessly: or, confidently</sup>
So will I make my holy<S>6944</S> name<S>8034</S> known<S>3045</S> in the midst<S>8432</S> of my people<S>5971</S> Israel<S>3478</S>; and I will not let them pollute<S>2490</S> my holy<S>6944</S> name<S>8034</S> any more: and the heathen<S>1471</S> shall know<S>3045</S> that I am the LORD<S>3068</S>, the Holy One<S>6918</S> in Israel<S>3478</S>.
Behold, it is come<S>935</S>, and it is done<S>1961</S>, saith<S>5002</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; this is the day<S>3117</S> whereof I have spoken<S>1696</S>.
And they that dwell<S>3427</S> in the cities<S>5892</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> shall go forth<S>3318</S>, and shall set<S>1197</S> on fire<S>784</S> and burn<S>5400</S> the weapons<S>5402</S>, both the shields<S>4043</S> and the bucklers<S>6793</S>, the bows<S>7198</S> and the arrows<S>2671</S>, and the handstaves<S>3027</S> <S>4731</S>, and the spears<S>7420</S>, and they shall burn<S>1197</S> them with fire<S>784</S> seven<S>7651</S> years<S>8141</S>: <sup>handstaves: or, javelins</sup> <sup>burn them: or, make a fire of them</sup>
So that they shall take<S>5375</S> no wood<S>6086</S> out of the field<S>7704</S>, neither cut down<S>2404</S> any out of the forests<S>3293</S>; for they shall burn<S>1197</S> the weapons<S>5402</S> with fire<S>784</S>: and they shall spoil<S>7997</S> those that spoiled<S>7997</S> them, and rob<S>962</S> those that robbed<S>962</S> them, saith<S>5002</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>.
And it shall come to pass in that day<S>3117</S>, that I will give<S>5414</S> unto Gog<S>1463</S> a place<S>4725</S> there of graves<S>6913</S> in Israel<S>3478</S>, the valley<S>1516</S> of the passengers<S>5674</S> on the east<S>6926</S> of the sea<S>3220</S>: and it shall stop<S>2629</S> the noses of the passengers<S>5674</S>: and there shall they bury<S>6912</S> Gog<S>1463</S> and all his multitude<S>1995</S>: and they shall call<S>7121</S> it The valley<S>1516</S> of Hamongog<S>1996</S>. <sup>noses: or, mouths</sup> <sup>Hamongog: that is, The multitude of Gog</sup>
And seven<S>7651</S> months<S>2320</S> shall the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> be burying<S>6912</S> of them, that they may cleanse<S>2891</S> the land<S>776</S>.
Yea, all the people<S>5971</S> of the land<S>776</S> shall bury<S>6912</S> them; and it shall be to them a renown<S>8034</S> the day<S>3117</S> that I shall be glorified<S>3513</S>, saith<S>5002</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>.
And they shall sever out<S>914</S> men<S>582</S> of continual employment<S>8548</S>, passing through<S>5674</S> the land<S>776</S> to bury<S>6912</S> with the passengers<S>5674</S> those that remain<S>3498</S> upon the face<S>6440</S> of the earth<S>776</S>, to cleanse<S>2891</S> it: after the end<S>7097</S> of seven<S>7651</S> months<S>2320</S> shall they search<S>2713</S>. <sup>men: Heb. men of continuance</sup>
And the passengers<S>5674</S> that pass through<S>5674</S> the land<S>776</S>, when any seeth<S>7200</S> a man's<S>120</S> bone<S>6106</S>, then shall he set up<S>1129</S> a sign<S>6725</S> by<S>681</S> it, till the buriers<S>6912</S> have buried<S>6912</S> it in the valley<S>1516</S> of Hamongog<S>1996</S>. <sup>set up: Heb. build</sup>
And also the name<S>8034</S> of the city<S>5892</S> shall be Hamonah<S>1997</S>. Thus shall they cleanse<S>2891</S> the land<S>776</S>. <sup>Hamonah: that is, The multitude</sup>
And, thou son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Speak<S>559</S> unto every feathered<S>3671</S> fowl<S>6833</S>, and to every beast<S>2416</S> of the field<S>7704</S>, Assemble<S>6908</S> yourselves, and come<S>935</S>; gather<S>622</S> yourselves on every side<S>5439</S> to my sacrifice<S>2077</S> that I do sacrifice<S>2076</S> for you, even a great<S>1419</S> sacrifice<S>2077</S> upon the mountains<S>2022</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, that ye may eat<S>398</S> flesh<S>1320</S>, and drink<S>8354</S> blood<S>1818</S>. <sup>unto: Heb. to the fowl of every wing</sup> <sup>my sacrifice: or, my slaughter</sup>
Ye shall eat<S>398</S> the flesh<S>1320</S> of the mighty<S>1368</S>, and drink<S>8354</S> the blood<S>1818</S> of the princes<S>5387</S> of the earth<S>776</S>, of rams<S>352</S>, of lambs<S>3733</S>, and of goats<S>6260</S>, of bullocks<S>6499</S>, all of them fatlings<S>4806</S> of Bashan<S>1316</S>. <sup>goats: Heb. great goats</sup>
And ye shall eat<S>398</S> fat<S>2459</S> till ye be full<S>7654</S>, and drink<S>8354</S> blood<S>1818</S> till ye be drunken<S>7943</S>, of my sacrifice<S>2077</S> which I have sacrificed<S>2076</S> for you.
Thus ye shall be filled<S>7646</S> at my table<S>7979</S> with horses<S>5483</S> and chariots<S>7393</S>, with mighty men<S>1368</S>, and with all men<S>376</S> of war<S>4421</S>, saith<S>5002</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>.
And I will set<S>5414</S> my glory<S>3519</S> among the heathen<S>1471</S>, and all the heathen<S>1471</S> shall see<S>7200</S> my judgment<S>4941</S> that I have executed<S>6213</S>, and my hand<S>3027</S> that I have laid<S>7760</S> upon them.
So the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> shall know<S>3045</S> that I am the LORD<S>3068</S> their God<S>430</S> from that day<S>3117</S> and forward<S>1973</S>.
And the heathen<S>1471</S> shall know<S>3045</S> that the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> went into captivity<S>1540</S> for their iniquity<S>5771</S>: because they trespassed<S>4603</S> against me, therefore hid<S>5641</S> I my face<S>6440</S> from them, and gave<S>5414</S> them into the hand<S>3027</S> of their enemies<S>6862</S>: so fell<S>5307</S> they all by the sword<S>2719</S>.
According to their uncleanness<S>2932</S> and according to their transgressions<S>6588</S> have I done<S>6213</S> unto them, and hid<S>5641</S> my face<S>6440</S> from them.
Therefore thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Now will I bring again<S>7725</S> the captivity<S>7622</S> <S>7622</S> of Jacob<S>3290</S>, and have mercy<S>7355</S> upon the whole house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, and will be jealous<S>7065</S> for my holy<S>6944</S> name<S>8034</S>;
After that they have borne<S>5375</S> their shame<S>3639</S>, and all their trespasses<S>4604</S> whereby they have trespassed<S>4603</S> against me, when they dwelt<S>3427</S> safely<S>983</S> in their land<S>127</S>, and none made them afraid<S>2729</S>.
When I have brought them again<S>7725</S> from the people<S>5971</S>, and gathered<S>6908</S> them out of their enemies'<S>341</S> lands<S>776</S>, and am sanctified<S>6942</S> in them in the sight<S>5869</S> of many<S>7227</S> nations<S>1471</S>;
Then shall they know<S>3045</S> that I am the LORD<S>3068</S> their God<S>430</S>, which caused them to be led into captivity<S>1540</S> among the heathen<S>1471</S>: but I have gathered<S>3664</S> them unto their own land<S>127</S>, and have left<S>3498</S> none of them any more there. <sup>which: Heb. by my causing of them, etc</sup>
Neither will I hide<S>5641</S> my face<S>6440</S> any more from them: for I have poured out<S>8210</S> my spirit<S>7307</S> upon the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, saith<S>5002</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>.
